name: Vanbec_Recliva
content:
Vanbec Recliva was a Kessurian female member of a dance troupe, alongside Sylphanie Stil and Charlu Sisi. The dance troupe, including Recliva, visited Pasaana for the Aki-Aki Festival of the Ancestors.
Vanbec Reclica was played by Rebecca Van Cleave in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker, who is listed as "creature and droid puppeteer" in the film's credits. The character's name serves as a tuckerization of the actress' name.
